formulas.name: Classical Probability
formulas.description: Favorable outcomes divided by total outcomes. Valid when all outcomes equally likely.

formulas.name: Addition Theorem (Union)
formulas.formula: P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) − P(A ∩ B)
formulas.description: Inclusion-exclusion for two events. For mutually exclusive: P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B)

formulas.name: Conditional Probability
formulas.description: Probability of A given B has occurred

formulas.name: Multiplication Rule
formulas.formula: P(A ∩ B) = P(A) × P(B|A) = P(B) × P(A|B)

formulas.name: Independent Events
formulas.formula: P(A ∩ B) = P(A) × P(B) iff A and B are independent
formulas.description: Events are independent if occurrence of one does not affect the other

formulas.name: Total Probability Theorem
formulas.description: When sample space is partitioned into events A₁, A₂, ..., Aₙ

formulas.name: Bayes' Theorem
formulas.description: Update probability of cause given observed effect
formulas.use_case: Problems asking 'given that X happened, what is the probability it came from source Y?'

formulas.name: Binomial Distribution
formulas.formula: P(X = k) = nCk × p^k × q^(n−k) where q = 1−p
formulas.description: n independent trials, each with success probability p

formulas.name: Binomial Mean & Variance
formulas.description: Mean and variance of binomial distribution

formulas.name: Expected Value
formulas.description: Weighted average of all possible values

formulas.name: Odds
formulas.formula: Odds in favor = P(A)/P(A'), Odds against = P(A')/P(A)
formulas.description: Ratio of favorable to unfavorable probabilities
